alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL VENANGO... NORTHEASTERN INDIANA...JEFFERSON...EAST CENTRAL ARMSTRONG...CLARION AND FOREST COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 845 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clarion, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Punxsutawney, Clarion, Brookville, Marienville, Knox, Rimersburg, Reynoldsville, Brockway, New Bethlehem, Tionesta, Sykesville, and Falls Creek. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 54 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northwestern and west central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango
